ns2:course.label: Freshman Orientation
ns2:course.description: Introduction to Computer Science as a field and career for computer science majors. Overview of the field and specific examples of problem areas and methods of solution.
ns2:course.sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Computer Science or Statistics & Computer Science or Math & Computer Science or Engineering Undeclared or Computer Sci & Anthropology or Computer Sci & Astronomy or Computer Sci & Chemistry or Computer Sci & Linguistics or Pre-Engineering or Computer Science&Crop Sciences or Computer Science and Music or Computer Science & Economics or Computer Science & Advertising or Computer Science & Geog & GIS or Computer Science & Philosophy or Computer Sci & Animal Sci major(s). Restricted to Undergrad - Urbana-Champaign.
ns2:course.sectionCappArea: Restricted to First Time Freshman students.
